description: This Code System includes the SPOR list for Legal Status for the Supply
copyright: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright ©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

concept.display: Narkootiline ravim - veterinaarravim
Veterinary medicinal product not subject to veterinary prescription, free trade for food-producing animals
concept.definition: Free trade for VMPs not subject to veterinary prescription only intented for food-producing animals.

concept.display: Veterinary medicinal product subject to not renewable veterinary prescription
Veterinary medicinal product subject to veterinary prescription, narcotic for use under veterinary or special supervision
Veterinary medicinal product subject to restricted veterinary prescription, use and administration exclusively by official veterinary services
Veterinary medicinal product not subject to veterinary prescription, free trade for non food-producing animals
concept.definition: Free trade for VMPs not subject to veterinary prescription only intented for companion animals (non food-producing animals)

concept.display: Veterinary medicinal product subject to veterinary prescription, psychotropic for use under veterinary or special supervision
Veterinary medicinal product subject to veterinary prescription and to single or multiple dispensing
Veterinary medicinal product subject to restricted veterinary prescription
Veterinary medicinal product subject to veterinary prescription, psychotropic use and administration exclusively by veterinarians
Veterinary medicinal product subject to single dispensing
Veterinary medicinal product subject to multiple dispensing
Veterinary medicinal product subject to renewable or not renewable veterinary prescription
Veterinary medicinal product subject to restricted veterinary prescription, use and administration exclusively by veterinarians
Veterinary medicinal product subject to veterinary prescription, psychotropic
concept.definition: VMPs which contain psychotropic drugs including those covered by the United Nations Single Convention on Psychotropics substances on 1971, the United Nations Convention against Illicit Traffic in Narcotic drugs and Psychotropic substances of 1988.

concept.display: Veterinary medicinal product subject to restricted veterinary prescription for use under veterinary or special supervision
Veterinary medicinal product subject to veterinary prescription, narcotic use and administration exclusively by veterinarians
Veterinary medicinal product subject to renewable veterinary prescription
Medicinal product not subject to medical prescription
Medicinal product subject to medical prescription
Medicinal product subject to special medical prescription
Veterinary medicinal product not subject to veterinary prescription
Veterinary medicinal product subject to veterinary prescription
concept.definition: This term covers all categories of article 34(1): - VMPs for food producing animals - antimicrobial VMPs - VMPs requiring prior diagnosis - euthanasia - Active substance used less than 5 years - immunological VMPs - Dir 96/22 hormonal, thyrostatic or beta-agonists.

concept.display: Medicinal product on medical prescription for non-renewable delivery
Medicinal product subject to special and restricted medical prescription
concept.definition: Guideline on legal status for the supply to the patient of centrally authorised products (EMEA/186279/2006) published in 2006

concept.display: Medicated feedingstuffs retailed by feedmills only under veterinary prescription
Veterinary medicinal product subject to veterinary prescription, narcotic
concept.definition: VMPs which contain narcotic drugs including those covered by the United Nations Single Convention on Narcotic drugs of 1961, the United Nations Convention against Illicit Traffic in Narcotic drugs and Psychotropic substances of 1988.

concept.display: Veterinary medicinal product not subject to veterinary prescription, dispensed by retailers
concept.definition: VMPs not subject to veterinary prescription only sold by retailers -persons permitted to supply VMPs by national law in accordance to article 103(1)-. This term covers pharmacies and/or veterinarians depending on national laws of the Member States.

concept.display: Medicinal product subject to restricted medical prescription
Medicinal product on medical prescription for renewable delivery
Medicinal product subject to medical prescription exempt for some pack sizes
Veterinary medicinal product subject to veterinary prescription except for some pack sizes
concept.definition: In some member states, the legal status of supply could differ for the diffrerent pack sizes of the same product.

concept.display: Medicinal product on medical prescription for renewable or non-renewable delivery

name: SPOR 100000072051 for Legal Status for the Supply
title: SPOR 100000072051 for Legal Status for the Supply
